body:
Hello,

So today i was playing CTH when suddenly MC started acting Funny, stuff like this was happening.
 Blocks were changing texture or turning invisible a lot.

Here is a video too: http://youtu.be/Q5lv67fTxr4 It may still be processing.
So please can someone tell me what is happening and how i can fix it? Thanks.

-Random
body_tagged:

title: What is Happening to my MC?

replies.body:
Most likely a visual glitch with a resource pack.

Try using the default resource pack and see if you're still getting glitches.
replies.body_tagged:
Most likely a visual glitch with a resource pack.

Try using the default resource pack and see if you're still getting glitches.

replies.body: I think is the resource pack or something that has to do with rendering the textures
replies.body_tagged: I think is the resource pack or something that has to do with rendering the textures

replies.body: Texture pack it happened with me take it off and put it back on!
replies.body_tagged: Texture pack it happened with me take it off and put it back on!

replies.body:
If it isn't the texture pack, try updating java if you can. Also, there is an option in optifine (if you are using it) called Chunk loading.

Options > Video Settings > Chunkloading

Have a fiddle about with it and see if that works.
replies.body_tagged:
If it isn't the texture pack, try updating java if you can. Also, there is an option in optifine (if you are using it) called Chunk loading.

Options > Video Settings > Chunkloading

Have a fiddle about with it and see if that works.

replies.body:
I changed texture packs and it still was weird, but i edited the Chunkloading and its fine again. 

Thanks for the help everyone! :D
replies.body_tagged:
I changed texture packs and it still was weird, but i edited the Chunkloading and its fine again. 

Thanks for the help everyone! :D
